title: Your preffered typeface.
content:
Hi guys,

I usually layout everything I send out. At an average i have a few tables, and 200-300 words of text. I prefer the sans serif - FLAMA and was just wondering what fonts you all prefer for general purpose work.

Thanks,  
arjun
author: Arjun

comments.content:
The font I would grab to most often for day to day stuff is Georgia, just cause it is available everywhere and imho the best systemfont. All the rest changes day by day.

cheerio Queneau

Not a fan of most of the microsoft typefaces myself but thanks for the tip! having a flexible screen and print font is quite helpfull!

--  
arjun
